description:
Commando: Steel Disaster is a shooting game based on a futuristic military theme.

Various sectors of a military group report being attacked by some of their own war machines and that a terrorist organization led by a man named Rattlesnake is at the center of each attack. A commando and vehicle specialist code-named Storm is assigned to enter each affected area and progressively stop Rattlesnakeâ€™s ambitions.

Features
* Excellent visuals and game graphics for an effective appearance!
* Very fluent and smooth gameplay!
* Very intense battle scenes!
name: Commando: Steel Disaster
